data.text: @AintStill @SunSentinel I agree that politicians are bought, but it seems these contributions would be untraceable through dark money - aka, politically active non profits

@SunSentinel There is no Marxism or Socialism in the US. You should know better than to throw those words around. Youâ€™re diluting the significance.  Just like your hero tramp praises Putin and inflates his significance.  Disgusting.
